page.title: 09Watford news-ASDA SUPERSTORE
page.content: ASDA are building a superstore on the old ODHAMS site. It will have a car park for 1500 cars. It will sell a wide range of products and attract customers from a wide area. This will increase traffic in the area a great deal. It will also affect the trade of other shops in the Garston area. It will provide jobs for a large number of local people. {CONCRETE BATCHING PLANT.} On Tuesday June 25th 1985 a public enquiry opened into the proposed development of a concrete batching plant in the area. Those opposing the development claim it will result in increased noise due to shunting of trains, pollution in the form of dust and an increased volume of traffic. {GARSTON INFANTS SCHOOL} - will move to the Lea Farm School site into a new building late in 1985.
